query:
UPDATE users 
SET status = 'active' 
WHERE email IN (
    'vantaggiosleale@gmail.com',
    'andrea.vaturi@gmail.com',
    'chiara.babini@gmail.com',
    'mirko.castignani@gmail.com',
    'andrea.pula@gmail.com'
) AND status = 'pending';
